name: The Echo (aloknarula)
description:
Theme: It does sound like me

Even your echoes in the cave don't sound like your own. Don't trust them till they sound like you.

Controls:
Move: WASD
Speak: Space
Drop/Pick Light: L

Good Luck Escaping the darkness

Developed by: Alok Narula
Voice Over: Bhumika Valmike
